content.fr: J'invoque le Règlement, monsieur le Président. La députée de Saanich—Gulf Islands a parlé d'hommes qui exécutent les basses oeuvres du gouvernement. Je lui saurais gré de retirer ce commentaire sexiste, car il y a beaucoup de jeunes femmes talentueuses qui travaillent au Cabinet du premier ministre.
content.en: Mr. Speaker, on a point of order, I have to rise and respond to the member for Saanich—Gulf Islands who made comments with respect to young boys in short pants. We have a lot of young talented women also working in the Prime Minister's Office. I would ask her to withdraw her sexist comments.
